summary: Completed testing of DevAI AI software developer app. Backend APIs functional for core operations, frontend UI working with authentication flow. Some session persistence issues and AI endpoint timeouts identified.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Timeout during AI task execution (>30 seconds)
flaky_endpoints.impact: Task execution takes too long, causing client timeouts
flaky_endpoints.note: Expected behavior due to AI processing time, may need async handling

configuration_issues.issue: GitHub OAuth not configured (missing CLIENT_ID and CLIENT_SECRET)
configuration_issues.impact: GitHub integration features unavailable but properly handled with error messages

integration_issues.issue: JWT token not persisting between page navigations in browser automation
integration_issues.impact: Users may get logged out unexpectedly during navigation

passed_tests: Backend API registration and login (100% success rate)
Dashboard stats and recent activity endpoints
Landing page displays correctly with hero section and terminal preview
Dashboard shows stats cards for projects, tasks, PRs
Navigation bar with Dashboard, Projects, Settings visible
AI model selection in settings (GPT-5.2, Claude Sonnet 4.5 configured)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session persistence issue in frontend - JWT tokens may not be properly stored/retrieved. Consider implementing proper token refresh mechanism and localStorage handling.
